attributes.action: equal rights regarding tv license for the deaf as for the blind.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we recieved a reply regarding the petition previously put to you about deaf people paying full tv licenses, we recieved your reply but you have seem to forgotten the point as t0o describing about subtitling etc on t.v the main point is the radio? why should we pay the radio part of the tv licence when we cant hear them! your response to this previously did not cover this issue and you went round the point rather than getting to it.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
